description: executes a shell command
help: Ej: exec, [float;] kitty or exec, [workspace 2] wofi --show drun

description: executes a raw shell command (does not support rules)
passes the key (with mods) to a specified window
closes (not kills) the active window
closes a specified window
changes the workspace
help: Ej: workspace, 3 or workspace, name:Web or workspace, e+1

description: moves the focused window to a workspace
moves the focused window to a workspace without switching to it
toggles the current window's floating state
sets the focused window's fullscreen mode
sets monitors' DPMS status (Do not use with keybind directly)
help: Ej: dpms, off or dpms, on DP-1

description: pins a window (shows on all workspaces) - floating only
moves the focus in a direction
help: Ej: movefocus, l (l, r, u, d)

description: moves the active window in a direction or to a monitor
help: Ej: movewindow, r or movewindow, mon:DP-3 silent

description: swaps the active window with another in a direction or specific window
help: Ej: swapwindow, u or swapwindow, class:kitty

description: centers the active window (floating only)
help: Ej: centerwindow or centerwindow, 1 (respects reserved area)

description: resizes the active window
moves the active window (offset)
focuses the next window
help: Ej: cyclenext or cyclenext, prev floating

description: toggles a special workspace (scratchpad) on/off
toggles the current active window into a group
switches to the next/previous window in a group
help: Ej: changegroupactive, f (forward) or changegroupactive, b (back)

description: exits the compositor immediately
help: Ej: exit (Warning: Use hyprshutdown for a cleaner exit)
